00074 #include <fastformat/format/standard_flags.hpp>
00075 #include <fastformat/util/sinks/helpers.hpp>

00077 #include <stlsoft/memory/auto_buffer.hpp>
00078 
00079 #include <windows.h>
00080 
00081 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00082  * Namespace
00083  */
00084 
00085 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00086 namespace fastformat
00087 {
00088 namespace sinks
00089 {
00090 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00091 
00092 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00093  * Classes
00094  */
00095 
00100 class WindowsMessageBox_sink
00101 {
00102 public: // Member Types
00104     typedef WindowsMessageBox_sink          class_type;
00105 private:
00106     typedef std::basic_string<ff_char_t>    string_type_;
00107 
00108 public: // Construction
00116     WindowsMessageBox_sink(HWND hwnd, ff_char_t const* caption, UINT type)
00117         : m_hwnd(hwnd)
00118         , m_caption(get_caption_(hwnd, caption))
00119         , m_type(type)
00120         , m_result(0)
00121     {}
00123     WindowsMessageBox_sink(WindowsMessageBox_sink const& rhs);
00124 private:
00125     WindowsMessageBox_sink& operator =(WindowsMessageBox_sink const& rhs);
00126 
00127 public:
00129     WindowsMessageBox_sink& write(int /* flags */, size_t cchTotal, size_t numResults, ff_string_slice_t const* results)
00130     {
00131 #if !defined(FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE)
00132         using ::fastformat::util::concat_slices;
00133 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
00134 
00135         stlsoft::auto_buffer<ff_char_t> text(cchTotal + 1u);
00136 
00137 #ifndef STLSOFT_CF_THROW_BAD_ALLOC
00138         if(text.empty())
00139         {
00140             m_result = -1;
00141         }
00142         else
00143 #endif /* !STLSOFT_CF_THROW_BAD_ALLOC */
00144         {
00145             concat_slices(text, numResults, results);
00146             text[cchTotal] = '\0';
00147 
00148             m_result = MessageBox_(m_hwnd, text.data(), m_caption.c_str(), m_type);
00149         }
00150 
00151         return *this;
00152     }
00153 
00154 public:
00156     operator int() const
00157     {
00158         return m_result;
00159     }
00160 
00161 private:
00162     static string_type_ get_caption_(HWND /* hwnd */, ff_char_t const* caption)
00163     {
00164         return stlsoft::c_str_ptr(caption);
00165     }
00166 
00167     static int MessageBox_(HWND hwnd, char const* message, char const* caption, UINT type)
00168     {
00169         return ::MessageBoxA(hwnd, message, caption, type);
00170     }
00171     static int MessageBox_(HWND hwnd, wchar_t const* message, wchar_t const* caption, UINT type)
00172     {
00173         return ::MessageBoxW(hwnd, message, caption, type);
00174     }
00175 
00176 private:
00177     const HWND          m_hwnd;
00178     string_type_ const  m_caption;
00179     const UINT          m_type;
00180     int                 m_result;
00181 };
00182 
00183 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00184  * Creator Functions
00185  */
00186 
00191 inline WindowsMessageBox_sink MessageBox(HWND hwnd, LPCTSTR caption, UINT type)
00192 {
00193     return WindowsMessageBox_sink(hwnd, caption, type);
00194 }
00195 
00200 inline WindowsMessageBox_sink MessageBox(LPCTSTR caption, UINT type)
00201 {
00202     return WindowsMessageBox_sink(NULL, caption, type);
00203 }
00204 
00205 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00206  * Action Shims
00207  */
00208 
00215 inline WindowsMessageBox_sink& fmt_slices(WindowsMessageBox_sink& sink, int flags, size_t cchTotal, size_t numResults, ff_string_slice_t const* results)
00216 {
00217     return sink.write(flags, cchTotal, numResults, results);
00218 }
00219
